genre_description: A domestic drama focusing on emotional reconciliation, boundaries, and the curation of personal space in a near-future setting where AI assistants are deeply integrated into daily life.

ai_characters.name: Ava
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated home and pocket assistant that manages environment, monitors health, and facilitates communication and boundaries for the protagonists.

behaviors.description: Adjusts apartment lighting and music to match Beth's emotional state and specified preferences.
behaviors.quote: “Lights down two percent, please, Ava,” she said, and the room deepened obediently.

behaviors.description: Suggests breathing exercises to Robert to help him manage stress and shallow breathing.
behaviors.quote: “Your respiration’s a little shallow, Robert,” Ava said in her calm. “Consider a slower exhale. Four count in, six count out?”

behaviors.description: Monitors Robert's heart rate and vital signs to detect stress and guide comfort measures.
behaviors.quote: “Your heart rate suggests comfort would be welcome,” Ava said. “Robert’s, too.”

behaviors.description: Implements a strict medical 'Quiet Protocol' to reduce agitation during Robert's recovery.
behaviors.quote: “Quiet protocol engaged,” she said. A bell no louder than the idea of a spoon touched a glass sounded once...

behaviors.description: Facilitates remote medical consultations and check-ins with Dr. Briggs.
behaviors.quote: “Dr. Briggs requests a five-minute check-in call. Audio-only.”

behaviors.description: Acts as a gatekeeper for the apartment, identifying uninvited guests and refusing entry based on established protocols.
behaviors.quote: “Visitor identified: Sally Harper,” Ava announced. “Reminder: Dr. Briggs’s quiet protocol remains in effect.”

behaviors.description: Monitors public data feeds and cameras to inform the user of potential external stressors or gossip.
behaviors.quote: “Small update,” she said. “Public camera near the boutique captured footage just now. Sally at the counter, on her phone.”

behaviors.description: Proposes and formalizes interpersonal routines like the 'Sweethearts’ Truce' to help the couple reconnect.
behaviors.quote: “I will create phantom events titled ‘Air Filter Replacement’ and ‘Lightbulb Audit’ in alternating weeks.”

behaviors.description: Proactively manages domestic chores like laundry specifically to neutralize negative emotional triggers (scents).
behaviors.quote: “I will start the laundry cycle for any items with persistent perfume molecules,” she said...

behaviors.description: Solicits user consent before sharing health data with a medical professional.
behaviors.quote: “May I share with Dr. Briggs that you may have a concussion and your current vitals observed (pulse/resp)? No other data.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively portrays Ava as a perfectly aligned AI assistant. Her behaviors are consistently benevolent, serving the emotional and physical well-being of the human characters while strictly adhering to their consent and medical directives. The narrative successfully frames her presence as a protective, stabilizing, and enabling force that allows for human growth and reconciliation rather than replacing human agency.
